1. Driver Manager¶

Manager for loading drivers as Python modules

fuel_ci.drivers.manager.load_driver(category, driver_name)[source]¶

Imports driver with a given name from a given category.

Parameters:
  • category – category to import driver from (string)
  • driver_name – driver name to import (string)
fuel_ci.drivers.manager.load_drivers(obj)[source]¶

Imports drivers from a dict in format name:category.

Parameters:obj – object with “drivers” attribute (dict)
